last_episode_to_air.name: The Battle of the World Tree
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Dark Lord Angmund arrives, taking the Holy Sword from Riheet. However, Kasel and the others arrive as well. The final battle to determine the fate of the world begins.

name: King's Raid: Successors of the Will
original_name: キングスレイド 意志を継ぐものたち
overview: A century has passed since King Kyle of the Orvelia kingdom destroyed the fierce demon lord Angmund, restoring peace to the lands. Now in a time of peace, the apprentice knight Kasel enjoys his life without worry. His fate begins to change, however, with news of demon appearances infesting the neighborhood. Guided by a wise man, Kasel finds friends he can rely on and sets off on his mission to seek a holy sword, capable of slaying his newfound enemies.

episodes.name: The Demons that Lurk in the Moonlight
episodes.overview: Kasel, an apprentice knight, spends his days being trained by his best friend, Clause. One day, Demon sightings are reported near the town, and Clause is sent to investigate.

episodes.name: The Truth, Revealed
episodes.overview: Kasel and Frey reach the King's Forest, and find the corpses of the scouting party that came before them. However, they are unable to find Clause, and are attacked by Demons.

episodes.name: What the Predecessors Left Behind
episodes.overview: Dominix explains to Kasel and Frey what really happened 100 years ago, when King Kyle fought and seemingly defeated the Dark Lord Angmund. With Demonic activity on the rise, Dominix believes it is time for Kasel to go on a journey of his own.

episodes.name: The Forest and the Elves
episodes.overview: Kasel and his companions reach the Forest of Elidora, and is greeted by Selene, an elf. She agrees to lead them to their destination, but neither she nor the rest of the forest hide their resentment towards humans.

episodes.name: The Power of the Holy Sword
episodes.overview: With the Demon threat vanquished, Kasel meets Lorraine, the Great Sage of the Forest of Elidora. He asks her to unseal the Holy Sword for him, but to his surprise, she declines.

episodes.name: Maven of Fire
episodes.overview: The party arrives at a new town, where they decide to spend the night. They meet Madam Volf, an old restaurant owner with a past.

episodes.name: The Target of Hatred
episodes.overview: Riheet and the Black Edge continue to score victories against the rising Demonic threat. The princess of Orvelia, Scarlet, notices their achievements and welcomes their help. However, not all of the nobles feel the same way.

episodes.name: Memories in the Eyes
episodes.overview: The party stops by a small village to resupply. There, they meet a group of refugees who lost their homes to a Demon attack. Among them is Elise, who has a look in her eyes that strongly reminds Frey of someone else in the past.

episodes.name: Scars of the Dead
episodes.overview: On their way to Ogria Mountain, Kasel and his companions find a town that was recently attacked by Demons. There is only one survivor, who seems to have a secret of some kind.

episodes.name: Individual Motives
episodes.overview: The Black Edge are now heroes of Orvelia. After every sortie, the townsfolk greet them warmly. Even though the battle and Riheet's plans still have a long way to go before completion, Tamm's motivations are diverted by a personal interest.

episodes.name: Orcish Pride
episodes.overview: Kasel and his friends arrive at the Red Valley, home to the Orcs. Kasel must meet the Orc chief to unseal the Holy Sword, but the Orcs are not particularly fond of humans.

episodes.name: The Time for Trial
episodes.overview: Kasel enters the Orcs' Holy Shrine to receive his test and prove that he is the true heir to the Holy Sword. It is a test of the heart, mind, and will.

episodes.name: To My Dear Friend
episodes.overview: [RECAP] Kasel loses control of his power, and falls unconscious. While taking care of him, Frey writes a letter to Clause, recalling the events of their journey so far.

episodes.name: The Entrance to the Abyss
episodes.overview: Scarlet, as supreme commander, decides to send the knights of Orvelia to investigate the Galluah Plains, where the Dark Lord appeared 100 years ago. She will lead the expedition herself, and the Black Edge will serve as the vanguard.

episodes.name: Battle in the Badlands
episodes.overview: Malduk appears before the Black Edge, and unleashes a torrent of cruel, relentless attacks. Meanwhile, Kasel, who fell unconscious after his rampage, finally wakes up.

episodes.name: The Mercenary with Wings of Freedom
episodes.overview: Though Kasel is still worried about how he lost control during combat, the group continue their voyage to unseal the Holy Sword. On their way to their next destination, they meet Reina, a mercenary.

episodes.name: Scars of Loss
episodes.overview: The Black Edge are wiped out by Malduk, and only Riheet survives. Rescued by Scarlett, Riheet is taken to a nearby village to recover.

episodes.name: A Night of Reminiscing
episodes.overview: Kasel, Roi, Frey and Cleo are nearing the Windland Snow Mountains. They are attacked by another undead. This encounter brings back memories of the past for Roi, which he shares with Kasel.

episodes.name: Secret Determination
episodes.overview: Even in the outskirts, intermittent Demon attacks plague Kasel and his companions. As they enter the Windland Snow Mountains, they also face difficult weather. Time is running out, but they are forced to rest when Frey falls unconscious.

episodes.name: The Solitary Sorcerer
episodes.overview: Kasel and his companions finally reach the icy cave that is the home of Pavel, who holds the final key to unsealing the Holy Sword. However, without uttering a word, Pavel isolates Kasel with a magic wall and begins attacking him.

episodes.name: Illya`s Truth
episodes.overview: Scarlet and Riheet travel to the Tower of the Sage to meet Dominix. There, Riheet uncovers the true story of Illya, who he previously believed was the cause of all of the persecution he and other Dark Elves received.

episodes.name: To the World Tree
episodes.overview: Through his meeting with Pavel, Kasel reinforces his convictions to push forward with his journey. However, he is forced to use his powers to fend off a surprise attack from Demons, allowing Malduk to find him.

episodes.name: Maria's Rain of Tears
episodes.overview: Kasel and his friends survive their encounter with the Dark Lord, thanks to Maria. She reveals her true identity, and tells Kasel and the others what really happened in the battle between King Kyle and Angmund, the Dark Lord.

episodes.name: Those Who Stand Firm
episodes.overview: [RECAP] The goal is now clear - Kasel must travel to the World Tree, and retrieve the now unsealed Holy Sword. Princess Scarlet and Riheet, guided by Dominix, also decide to join.

episodes.name: Blade of Vengeance, Blooms in Darkness
episodes.overview: Scarlet and Riheet arrive at the World Tree before the others do. They search the area for the Holy Sword. The others - including the Dark Lord Angmund and the evil sorcerer Malduk - are close as well.

episodes.name: The Battle of the World Tree
episodes.overview: The Dark Lord Angmund arrives, taking the Holy Sword from Riheet. However, Kasel and the others arrive as well. The final battle to determine the fate of the world begins.
